finished your lily base you can stop here if you d like or proceed to the next page for optional embellishments embellishments these are optional cut out strands of pink and white yarn to sew flowers into the lily your yarn needle will be very helpful here you can also use other colors and designs this is very open-ended congratulations you ve finished the pattern i hope you had fun making this if
